body_html: @ramonh yes, I'd say that's how it should work. Maybe it sucks a bit for last-minute applications, but I don't really see any other way — other than a way of still submitting the application and flagging it, but we have no time for this right now. After all, this is in the requirements, so they should not be able to submit an application without.

body: @ramonh yes, I'd say that's how it should work. Maybe it sucks a bit for last-minute applications, but I don't really see any other way — other than a way of still submitting the application and `flagging` it, but we have no time for this right now. After all, this is in the requirements, so they should not be able to submit an application without.
